page.title: 13RADSTOCK POLICE
page.content: In Radstock police station there are a total of 28 people working.The highest ranked officer in Radstock is the Inspector.The policemans shift work, with regard to the hours he works covers twenty four hours each day.They dont have any cells but one detention room. The retiring age of a police man is fifty five.In the station there are eight comunity policemen.There are seven cars available at Radstock including one Landrover.There are no police dogs but if they want them they come from Bath.At the police station their biggest major headache is anything to do with crime.They have no computer but make use of one in Bristol.As a community policeman the daily duties are keeping the peace, preventing and detecting crime,dealing with accidents,visiting schools and clubs and checking public houses.
